name: severo
description: A framework to bind Store/Action attributes and methods on React Components

scripts.build: node node_modules/browserify/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-2 react ] ] src/main.js -o index.js
scripts.test:cov: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --compilers js:babel-core/register --colors --reporter dot test/**/*
scripts.test:travis: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --compilers js:babel-core/register --colors --reporter spec test/**/*
